Book.title: Circumference
Book.author: Nicholas Nicastro
Book.summary: Eratosthenes and the Ancient Quest to Measure the Globe.

Book.title: Angels and Demons
Book.author: Dan Brown
Book.summary: Robert Langdon is summoned to a Swiss research facility to analyze a cryptic symbol seared into the chest of a murdered physicist.

Book.title: Keep the Aspidistra Flying
Book.author: George Orwell
Book.summary: A poignant and ultimately hopeful look at class and society, Keep the Aspidistra Flying pays tribute to the stubborn virtues of ordinary people who keep the aspidistra flying.
